review: 10/10, Honest, Loud Industral Rock AND chill rap vibes. Favorite tracks: 'Baby Me' and 'i can see clearly'.
9.5/10, Smooth, dreamy indie-pop vibes. Favorite tracks: 'Lovers Rock' and 'Birds Don’t Sing'.
8.5/10, Raw and experimental demos spanning 1997–2001, a cool listen, full of lo-fi and glitchy textures.
